class.name: StreamPeerTCP
class.description: TCP Stream peer. This object can be used to connect to TCP servers, or also is returned by a tcp server.

method.name: connect
method.description: Connect to the specified IP:port pair. Returns [OK] on success or [FAILED] on failure.

method.name: get_connected_host
method.description: Return the IP of this peer.

method.name: get_connected_port
method.description: Return the port of this peer.

method.name: get_status
method.description: Return the status of the connection, one of STATUS_* enum.

method.name: is_connected
method.description: Return whether this peer is connected. Returns true while connecting and connected.

constants.constant: The initial status of the [StreamPeerTCP], also the status after a disconnect.
A status representing a [StreamPeerTCP] that is connecting to a host.
A status representing a [StreamPeerTCP] that is connected to a host.
A staus representing a [StreamPeerTCP] in error state.
